ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will throw error if the EtQ number CMP- is left blank for the specified values. Closing PS case when ETQ is missing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.Name = "Personalized Solutions", ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(Status,"Closed"), (ISBLANK(EtQ__c)), OR( (ISPICKVAL(PSI_Solution__c,"Complaint - Forward to EtQ")), (ISPICKVAL(Category__c,"CS - D - Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Category__c,"PSI - G - Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Category_Type__c,"Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Catergory__c,"Complaint")), (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Catergory__c,"ETQ #")) ) )
